title: AI adoption leading to moderation in entry-level hiring: Report
description: Gen AI is primarily functioning as a productivity-enhancing complement to technical and analytical work, rather than a substitute, the report said

title: India's AI Approach Must Be Sovereign By Design; Data Control, Capabilities To Benefit Everyone: BCGX
description: BCGX emphasised that India's AI strategy must be "sovereign by design" to ensure the nation controls its own data and capabilities while staying globally integrated.

title: Social network for AI bots: Why Moltbook is fueling hopes and fears
description: A platform for AI agents has become a flashpoint for debates about machine autonomy, business disruption, and cybersecurity vulnerabilities.

title: India must pursue 'sovereign by design' AI approach to benefit all: BCGX
description: AI in India will drive productivity, quality, and role redesign in the near term rather than mass unemployment, but the country must pursue a "sovereign by design" approach, maintaining control over its data and capabilities while staying globally integrated to ensure AI benefits everyone, according to BCGX.

title: Kerala launches massive AI literacy drive targeting 6 lakh parents
description: Thiruvananthapuram, Feb 15 (PTI) Kerala Infrastructure and Technology for Education (KITE), the technical arm of the state General Education Department, has launched a massive artificial intelligence literacy drive targeting the adult population. Titled ‘Sarvam AI Mayam’ (AI is Everywhere), the initiative is considered as the largest such artificial intelligence awareness programme to be implemented in [...]
